mainPage.title: Efficient Bots for Automated Cryptocurrency Trading
mainPage.subtitle: Cryptocurrency trading bots automate transactions, reducing risks and increasing trading efficiency. They allow traders to execute operations quickly and accurately, making bots a valuable tool for all market participants.

benefits.title: Why Choose Us

security.title: Security
security.description: Your API keys are encrypted and stored securely. We never have access to your funds.

speed.title: High Speed
speed.description: Fast order execution with less than 50ms delay. Our servers are located near exchanges.

profitability.title: Profitability
profitability.description: Average return of our users is 15-25% per month with proper setup.

support.title: 24/7 Support
support.description: Round-the-clock technical support in Russian and English.

updates.title: Constant Updates

community.title: Community
community.description: Access to a private community of traders with experience and strategy sharing.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to the most popular questions about our pricing plans

cancel.question: Can I cancel my subscription at any time?
cancel.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time without penalties. Access to features will remain until the end of the paid period.

payment.question: What payment methods do you accept?
payment.answer: We accept Visa, MasterCard, PayPal cards, as well as cryptocurrencies: Bitcoin, Ethereum, USDT.

trial.question: Is there a trial period?
trial.answer: Yes, the basic plan is completely free. For paid plans, a 7-day trial period is available.

change.question: Can I change my plan while using it?
change.answer: Yes, you can upgrade to a higher plan at any time. The difference will be credited proportionally.

profit.question: Do you guarantee profit?
profit.answer: We cannot guarantee profit, as cryptocurrency trading involves risks. But our algorithms are optimized to minimize risks.

start.question: How quickly can I start trading?
start.answer: After registration and adding API keys, you can start trading in just 5 minutes.

cta.title: Ready to start trading?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of traders who have already automated their trading
